      • convertCoordinates

        public <X extends Annotation> AnnotationCollection<DerivedAnnotation<X>> convertCoordinates(AnnotationCollection<X> readCollection,
                                                                                   CoordinateSpace referenceSpaceForAnnotations,
                                                                                   boolean fullyContained)
        Description copied from interface: AnnotationCollection
        TODO Consider returning an AnnotationCollection Convert the annotation from the reference space If the reference equals the reference of the FeatureSpace it will return feature space If the reference equals the feature in the FeatureSpace it will return reference space If the reference doesn't equal either, it will throw an Exception
        Specified by:
        convertCoordinates in interface AnnotationCollection<T extends Annotation>
        referenceSpaceForAnnotations - The reference coordinate space of the annotation to map (must match either reference or feature space)
        fullyContained - whether to only convert a fragment if it is fully within the feature (true) or return the trimmed partial (false)
        Returns:
        An iterator of annotations in the new feature space (A window object but really can be anything with hasParent())
